column1: Ufthak was an Orcs of the Tower of Cirith Ungol.
Ufthak was captured and poisoned by Shelob
column2: and encased in her webbings. Shagrat
column5: but made no effort to free him as he was eager to leave the caves without making Shelob angry.

column1: 2003: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King (video game)

column2: a lone Orc can be found in the "Shelobs Lair" level
column3: fighting for his life against Shelobs children in a small
column4: web-filled chamber. While it might not truly be Ufthak himself
column5: it may still be a homage to his fate.

column1: :He can be left to fend for himself
column2: but he will start fighting the player if they choose to save him from his attackers.
